post.title: wtb canadian factory unlocked iphone 4 32gb
post.content: i am looking to buy a canadian factory unlocked iphone 4 32gb. i will pay up to $1100 usd for it shipped to california. i am paypal verified. you must have positive feedback on ebay, hofo or some buying/selling site. i can wait, as i expect the market to be flooded with them soon, so if you offer to sell it to me for more than $1100 i will refuse.
